item.title: 2021 03 29 React Tips
item.description: React Tips How to import const from other modules A good rule is to keep all constants in a separate file, away from all Views. Try creating a file for all App Constants. Constants.js is a good choice. Then put constants in like this: 1 2 3 4 5 6 const Constants = { AZURE_BLOB_CONTAINER: 'gisdatacontainer', ARCGIS_USERNAMER: 'user', ARCGIS_PORTAL: 'https://www.arcgis.com/portal' } export default Constants Then you can import your constants
